columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the SQL server.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a SQL server uniquely.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The resource type of the SQL server.

columns.name: state
columns.description: The state of the server.

columns.name: kind
columns.description: The Kind of sql server.

columns.name: location
columns.description: The resource location.

columns.name: administrator_login
columns.description: Specifies the username of the administrator for this server.

columns.name: administrator_login_password
columns.description: The administrator login password.

columns.name: minimal_tls_version
columns.description: Minimal TLS version. Allowed values: '1.0', '1.1', '1.2'.

columns.name: public_network_access
columns.description: Whether or not public endpoint access is allowed for this server.

columns.name: version
columns.description: The version of the server.

columns.name: fully_qualified_domain_name
columns.description: The fully qualified domain name of the server.

columns.name: server_audit_policy
columns.description: Specifies the audit policy configuration for server.

columns.name: server_security_alert_policy
columns.description: Specifies the security alert policy configuration for server.

columns.name: server_azure_ad_administrator
columns.description: Specifies the active directory administrator.

columns.name: server_vulnerability_assessment
columns.description: Specifies the server's vulnerability assessment.

columns.name: firewall_rules
columns.description: A list of firewall rules for this server.

columns.name: automatic_tuning
columns.description: Automatic tuning setting for this server.

columns.name: encryption_protector
columns.description: The server encryption protector.

columns.name: private_endpoint_connections
columns.description: The private endpoint connections of the sql server.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: Specifies the set of tags attached to the server.

columns.name: virtual_network_rules
columns.description: A list of virtual network rules for this server.

columns.name: failover_groups
columns.description: A list of failover groups for this server.
